intro.title: Real estate has entered a new era. Places must come alive.
intro.body: For too long, real estate has been reduced to square meters. At Curiosity.Builders, we don't just talk about buildings: we help create new visual, entrepreneurial, institutional, and social horizons — by bringing creativity back into the way living spaces are conceived, developed, and financed. Our goal: designing places that are useful, desirable, and built to last.

book.title: Changing Real Estate: from Utopia to Reality
book.description: Written by Claire Flurin Bellec and Fanny Costes, published by Éditions de l'Aube, this book gathers the perspectives of more than fifty leaders around a shared conviction: real estate is undergoing a profound transformation.
book.quote: Building a desirable and profitable future is not a dream — it is a business imperative.
